fields.name: addressCountry
fields.title: Address Country
fields.description: The country. For example, USA. You can also provide the two-letter ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 country code.

fields.name: addressLocality
fields.title: Address Locality
fields.description: The locality. For example, Mountain View.

fields.name: postOfficeBoxNumber
fields.title: Post Office Box Number
fields.description: The post office box number for PO box addresses.

fields.name: streetAddress
fields.title: Street Address
fields.description: The street address. For example, 1600 Amphitheatre Pkwy.
